original_text: Still the Lord did not turn from the burning of his great wrath, by which his anger was kindled against Judah, because of all the provocations with which Manasseh had provoked him.
korean_text: 그러나 여호와께서 유다를 향하여 내리신 그 크게 타오르는 진노를 돌이키지 아니하셨으니 이는 므낫세가 여호와를 격노하게 한 그 모든 격노 때문이라

sentences.original_text: Still the Lord did not turn
from the burning of his great wrath
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 크게 타오르는 분노를 거두지 않으셨다

sentences.original_text: by which his anger was kindled
with which Manasseh had provoked him
